Button.name: AddItem
Button.toolTip: Add selected items to the working copy.

Button.name: AddRepositoryRoot
Button.toolTip: Add a new URL to the Repository Explorer.

Button.name: AddSolutionToRepository
Button.toolTip: Add this solution to a Subversion repository.

Button.name: AddWorkingCopyExplorerRoot
Button.toolTip: Add a new root to the Working Copy Explorer.

Button.name: Blame
Button.toolTip: Identify which user wrote which lines.

Button.name: Checkout
Button.toolTip: Checkout a Subversion repository.

Button.name: CheckoutFolder
Button.toolTip: Checkout this folder.

Button.name: CheckoutSolution
Button.toolTip: Checkout this solution.

Button.name: Cleanup
Button.toolTip: Cleanup the working copy.

Button.name: CommitItem
Button.toolTip: Commit selected items to the Subversion repository.

Button.name: CopyReposExplorerUrl
Button.toolTip: Copy the Url of this item to the clipboard.

Button.name: CreatePatch
Button.toolTip: Create a patch file of changes.

Button.name: DiffExternalLocalItem
Button.toolTip: Diff against local text base using external tool.

Button.name: DiffLocalItem
Button.toolTip: Show differences compared to local text base.

Button.name: EditConfigFile
Button.toolTip: Configure AnkhSVN.

Button.name: Export
Button.text: E&xport a Repository or Local Folder...
Button.toolTip: Export a Subversion repository or local folder.

Button.name: ExportFolder
Button.toolTip: Export this folder.

Button.name: Lock
Button.toolTip: Lock the selected item.

Button.name: Log
Button.toolTip: Show the change log for the selected item.

Button.name: NewDirectory
Button.toolTip: Create a new directory here.

Button.name: Refresh
Button.toolTip: Refresh this view.

Button.name: RefreshRepositoryItem
Button.toolTip: Refresh this item.

Button.name: Relocate
Button.toolTip: Relocate this file.

Button.name: RemoveRepositoryRoot
Button.toolTip: Remove a URL from the Repository Explorer.

Button.name: RemoveWorkingCopyExplorerRoot
Button.toolTip: Remove this root from the Working Copy Explorer.

Button.name: ResolveConflict
Button.toolTip: Resolve conflict between changes.

Button.name: ResolveConflictExternal
Button.toolTip: Resolve conflict between changes using external tool.

Button.name: RevertItem
Button.toolTip: Revert this item to last updated revision.

Button.name: RevertToRevision
Button.toolTip: Revert this item to a specific revision.

Button.name: SaveToFile
Button.toolTip: Save the file to disk.

Button.name: SendFeedback
Button.toolTip: Send the AnkhSVN team comments and suggestions.

Button.name: ShowCommitDialog
Button.toolTip: Show the commit dialog.

Button.name: SwitchItem
Button.toolTip: Switch this item to a different URL.

Button.name: ToggleAnkh
Button.toolTip: Enable Ankh for this solution.

Button.name: Unlock
Button.toolTip: Unlock the selected items.

Button.name: UpdateItem
Button.toolTip: Updates local items with changes from the Subversion repository.

Button.name: ViewInVsNet
Button.toolTip: View this file in Visual Studio.

Button.name: ViewInWindows
Button.toolTip: Have Windows launch the associated application.

Button.name: ViewRepositoryFile
Button.toolTip: View this file

Button.name: ShowRepositoryExplorer
Button.toolTip: Show the Repository Explorer window.

Button.name: ShowWorkingCopyExplorer
Button.toolTip: Show the Working Copy Explorer window.
